text:
Federal law gives a tax credit to eligible small employers who provide health care coverage to their employees. Questions and answers provide information on the credit for tax years beginning in 2014.
Who Gets the Tax Credit
Calculating the Credit
Determining FTEs and Average Annual Wages
How to Claim the Credit
More detailed guidance for tax years beginning after 2013 is available in the final regulationsPDF, Notice 2014-06PDF and Notice 2015-08PDF. Guidance for tax years beginning in 2010 through 2013 is available in the proposed regulationsPDF and Notices 2010-44PDF and 2010-82PDF.
